name: Cheeseburger Macaroni Casserole
author: cspeer1
summary: This taste better then hamburger helper and my kids love it!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook elbow macaroni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, 8 minutes
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease
Add ground beef back to skillet and mix in tomatoes; season with salt and pepper
Cook and stir mixture until tomatoes are heated through, about 5 minutes
Transfer beef mixture to a casserole dish; top with cooked macaroni
Spread cream cheese over macaroni and sprinkle Cheddar cheese over cream cheese
Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and bubbling, about 45 minutes
Cool casserole for 15 minutes before serving
